description.value: Character gains +10 bonus whenever rerolling a Test with a Fate Point after failing the initial attempt. They may spend a Reaction to pass this beenfit to any ally spending Fate Points to re-roll a Test as long as the Ally is within Line of Sight and Communication Range.
